REASON: Fatigue, shortness of breath, chronic cough
SIDE EFFECTS FOR UNIRETIC: Worked very well for a couple of years, only occasional fatigue.

UNIRETIC: Developed chronic dry cough, which is a side effect of this medication and a shortness of breath feeling.  Dr. switched me to Avalide, which is working better than the Uniretic and no chronic coughing!  Average BP runs 124/85, sometimes lower.

REASON: felt weak, arms felt heavy and I had no energy
SIDE EFFECTS FOR UNIRETIC: I could not work on this medication
